LanguageData.SYR_Agile.degreeDatas.stealthy.label: stealthy
LanguageData.SYR_Agile.degreeDatas.stealthy.descripti: {PAWN_nameDef} is uncommonly agile and stealthy, with better reflexes and a more flexible body than most.
LanguageData.SYR_AnimalAffinity.degreeDatas.animal_fr:
{PAWN_nameDef} has a special connection to animals and understands them better than most people. Animals also tend to understand what {PAWN_pronoun} wants from them. The time {PAWN_pronoun} spends with animals is long, but worth it.
Taming never causes manhunter Easier taming of very wild animals
LanguageData.SYR_Architect.degreeDatas.architect.desc:
{PAWN_nameDef} is proficient with various construction materials, particularly stone. {PAWN_pronoun} will construct anything out of stone three times as fast as others and smooth out your rocky base in no time.
Stone construction speed +200%
LanguageData.SYR_CreativeThinker.degreeDatas.creative:
{PAWN_nameDef} has a unique approach to science. {PAWN_pronoun} always thinks outside the box and finds inspiration for intellectual problems in art.
Artistic increases research speed
LanguageData.SYR_GoodFortune.degreeDatas.fortunate.de: {PAWN_nameDef} seems to have rented all the good fortune on this Rimworld.
LanguageData.SYR_GreenThumb.degreeDatas.green_thumb.d:
{PAWN_nameDef} has a special talent to grow plants and nurture them even in hostile enviroments. {PAWN_pronoun} can grow any plant, even if other people would fail due to their lack of skills. {PAWN_pronoun} would like some plants in {PAWN_possessive} bedroom.
Can grow any plant regardless of skill
LanguageData.SYR_GunNut.degreeDatas.gun_nut.label: gun nut
LanguageData.SYR_GunNut.degreeDatas.gun_nut.descripti: {PAWN_nameDef} is a gun nut, {PAWN_possessive} life revolves around guns, how they are crafted, maintained and used. Quite a handy skill in these circumstances. Just don't hand {PAWN_objective} a melee weapon.
LanguageData.SYR_Haggler.degreeDatas.silver_tongue.de: {PAWN_nameDef} knows exactly the right words for every situation. This also means {PAWN_possessive} insults hurt more.
LanguageData.SYR_HandEyeCoordination.degreeDatas.hand: {PAWN_nameDef} is exceptionally coordinated with his hands.
LanguageData.SYR_KeenEye.degreeDatas.keen_eye.label: keen eye
LanguageData.SYR_KeenEye.degreeDatas.keen_eye.descrip: {PAWN_nameDef} has a keen eye and can spot even tiny mineral deposits. {PAWN_pronoun} will occassionally find small clumps of resources when mining any sort of stone or ore. Chance increased for flatter terrain.
LanguageData.SYR_MechanoidExpert.degreeDatas.mechanoi:
{PAWN_nameDef} has had their fair share of encounters with mechanoids. {PAWN_pronoun} has become an expert in mechanoid construction and combat, making {PAWN_objective} uniquely suited to disassemble and fight them.
Damage versus mechanoids +50%
LanguageData.SYR_Perfectionist.degreeDatas.perfection:
{PAWN_nameDef} wants thing to be exactly right. This does take time, but the results speak for themselves.
Quality level +1 (50% chance)
LanguageData.SYR_SteadyHands.degreeDatas.steady_hands:
{PAWN_nameDef} has particularly steady hands, which don't even tremble in dire circumstances or when {PAWN_pronoun} {PAWN_objective}self is injured.
No self-tend penalty
LanguageData.SYR_StrongBack.degreeDatas.strong_back.d: {PAWN_nameDef} has a very strong back or is part mule or something. {PAWN_pronoun} can carry significantly more as a normal person.
